mapper.update: update d_equipacc set equipaccid=equipaccid ,occurtime=#{occurtime} ,position=#{position} ,cause=#{cause} ,responsibility=#{responsibility} ,dealresult=#{dealresult} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} where equipaccid=#{equipaccid}

update d_equipacc set equipaccid=equipaccid ,occurtime=#{occurtime} ,position=#{position} ,cause=#{cause} ,responsibility=#{responsibility} ,dealresult=#{dealresult} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} where 1=1 and equipaccid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and equipaccid =#{Where_Id} and equipaccid=#{Where_equipaccid} and occurtime=#{Where_occurtime} and position=#{Where_position} and cause=#{Where_cause} and responsibility=#{Where_responsibility} and dealresult=#{Where_dealresult} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid}
mapper.select: select t.equipaccid "equipaccid", t.occurtime "occurtime", t.position "position", t.cause "cause", t.responsibility "responsibility", t.dealresult "dealresult", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_equipacc t where equipaccid=#{equipaccid}

select t.equipaccid "equipaccid", t.occurtime "occurtime", t.position "position", t.cause "cause", t.responsibility "responsibility", t.dealresult "dealresult", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_equipacc t where 1=1 and t.equipaccid=#{equipaccid} and t.occurtime=#{occurtime} and t.position=#{position} and t.cause=#{cause} and t.responsibility=#{responsibility} and t.dealresult=#{dealresult} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}

select t.equipaccid "equipaccid", t.occurtime "occurtime", t.position "position", t.cause "cause", t.responsibility "responsibility", t.dealresult "dealresult", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_equipacc t where 1=1 and t.equipaccid=#{equipaccid} and t.occurtime=#{occurtime} and t.position=#{position} and t.cause=#{cause} and t.responsibility=#{responsibility} and t.dealresult=#{dealresult} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}
mapper.delete: delete from d_equipacc where 1=1 and equipaccid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and equipaccid =#{Where_Id} and equipaccid=#{Where_equipaccid} and occurtime=#{Where_occurtime} and position=#{Where_position} and cause=#{Where_cause} and responsibility=#{Where_responsibility} and dealresult=#{Where_dealresult} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid}
mapper.select: select t.equipaccid "equipaccid", t.occurtime "occurtime", t.position "position", t.cause "cause", t.responsibility "responsibility", t.dealresult "dealresult", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid" from d_equipacc t where 1=1 and t.equipaccid=#{equipaccid} and t.occurtime=#{occurtime} and t.position=#{position} and t.cause=#{cause} and t.responsibility=#{responsibility} and t.dealresult=#{dealresult} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}

select count(*) from d_equipacc t where 1=1 and t.equipaccid=#{equipaccid} and t.equipaccid!=#{NoId} and t.occurtime=#{occurtime} and t.position=#{position} and t.cause=#{cause} and t.responsibility=#{responsibility} and t.dealresult=#{dealresult} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid}
